textAfterTable: Bay Inclusive - Rothesay 5 days  Make the most of your time away to Rothesay with one of our exclusive Bay Inclusive Breaks. Tuck into a full cooked breakfast, explore on your sightseeing excursions, then return to your hotel for a tempting three-course evening meal and enjoy the entertainment!   Glenburn Hotel , Rothesay, Isle of Bute Our customers rate this holiday 5 out of 5 stars ( from 59 customers ) 5 days from only £124 per person. £124 per person.
